Pore/Structural Features.Structure Type: 3D porous network with super cage cavities

Other Information.Additional Info: Adsorption capacity: 64.27 mL/g at 1 bar; Selectivity for n-C4H8/i-C4H8: 1.67 × 10^7
Negligible adsorption; Adsorption capacity: 2.55 mL/g at 298 K

Sieving Mechanism: Window-specific shrinkage enabling size exclusion between n-C4H8 and i-C4H8

Experimental Validation.Method: Breakthrough experiment, In situ single-crystal X-ray diffraction (SCXRD), GCMC simulation
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: n-C4H8/i-C4H8 selectivity: 1.67 × 10^7, Productivity: 105 L/kg for i-C4H8

Other Information.Additional Info: High-purity i-C4H8 (≥99.999%) achieved in one-step adsorption; Stable under humid conditions and recyclable
